author: veithen
msg: Replaced some instances of assertTrue by more specific assertions such as assertEquals, assertNull and assertNotNull.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits "my time screen in project mgr shows wrong labels with entry field for hours" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3942) - OFBIZ-3942
The my time entry screen for hours in Project Mgr shows labels (in English) for the hour columns in following order: sun, mon,tue,wen,thu,fri,sat.
However when entering hours on in e.g the mon(day) column the actual date registered for the hours is for tuesday.
Seems like the week starts on monday, not on sunday
JLR: works well, would need more work for those who prefer to have weeks start on Monday...
